annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I am taking a look at a classic cocktail called a Boulevardier. The Boulevardier is a cocktail with origins in Harry’s New Y...
annotations.title: Boulevardier | How to Drink

textContent:
1.5oz Sweet vermouth
1.5oz Campari
2oz Bourbon

Stir with broken ice and pour
Garnish with orange twist and cherries

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jjBG-Ls2QrM
title: Bouevardier
